title: China Media Yearbook & Directory
text:
The China Media Yearbook & Directory (<a href="traditional%20Chinese">traditional Chinese</a>: 中國媒體年鑑; <a href="simplified%20Chinese">simplified Chinese</a>: 中国媒体年鉴), also spelled as China Media Yearbook and Directory, sometimes known as China Media Yearbook, is a <a href="China">China</a>-based comprehensive <a href="publication">publication</a> on the <a href="media%20market">market</a> covering <a href="China">China</a>'s media industries published in <a href="English%20language">English language</a>. It has been published annually since 1999 by <a href="CMM%20Intelligence%20Limited">CMM Intelligence Limited</a> and <a href="General%20Agency%20of%20China%20Sports%20Daily%20Agency">General Agency of China Sports Daily Agency</a> (中国体育报社总社).
"China Media Yearbook" is the only English annual publication on the media market in the <a href="Mainland%20China">Mainland China</a>. The main content of the Yearbook includes in-depth <a href="analysis">analysis</a> and <a href="insight">insight</a>s into the Chinese media industries, including <a href="TV">TV</a> <a href="policies">policies</a> and content, print, film, new media, advertising, the latest developments in Chinese media policies and <a href="regulation">regulation</a>s, media trends and <a href="Financial%20transaction">business transaction</a>s as well as <a href="property">proprietary</a> <a href="statistics">statistics</a> and a comprehensive list including enterprise profiles of over 300 major Chinese media institutions in various industries.
